localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Now you can be part of the Presearch Decentralized Search experience by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine while earning PRE tokens.
blogPost.body: Now you can be part of the Presearch Decentralized Search experience by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine while earning PRE tokens.
blogPost.title: Presearch 2.0 - The network powering presearch decentralized search engine
blogPost.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: 现在，你可以通过操作Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch分散式搜索引擎，同时赚取PRE代币，成为Presearch分散式搜索体验的一部分。
localize.tagline: 为presearch去中心化搜索引擎提供动力的网络。

localize.description: 現在，你可以通過操作Presearch節點，幫助推動Presearch分散式搜索引擎，同時賺取PRE代幣，成爲Presearch分散式搜索體驗的一部分。
localize.tagline: 爲presearch去中心化搜索引擎提供動力的網絡。

previous.excerpt: Tweet Peep 👀 gives you instant, one-click access to what other people are saying about the articles and videos you're browsing. It shortens the great-minds-think-alike process. Let's peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter!
previous.title: Tweet Peep - Peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 让您可以一键访问其他人对您正在浏览的文章和视频的评价。它缩短了伟大的头脑--想法--相似的过程。让我们在Twitter上偷看别人对媒体的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窥视其他人对媒体的想法。

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 讓您可以一鍵訪問其他人對您正在瀏覽的文章和視頻的評價。它縮短了偉大的頭腦--想法--相似的過程。讓我們在Twitter上偷看別人對媒體的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窺視其他人對媒體的想法。

next.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
next.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board

localize.description: 跟踪重要的任务和项目，创建即将到来的事件，保持笔记和控制费用在一个概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待办事项，或者看到你上周花了多少钱。
localize.tagline: 用一块板子整理你的整个生活

localize.description: 跟蹤重要的任務和項目，創建即將到來的事件，保持筆記和控制費用在一個概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待辦事項，或者看到你上週花了多少錢。
localize.tagline: 用一塊板子整理你的整個生活
